ygData.subject: Re: Collapsable pole
ygData.msgSnippet: Just because it was dropped by a GM quest mob, does not automatically mean that it is possible for us to tinker one. ... gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land -
ygData.messageBody:
Just because it was dropped by a GM quest mob, does not automatically mean
that it is possible for us to tinker one.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 17, 1997 5:07 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Collapsable pole


> From: lockjaw <lockjaw@...>
>
> The pole IS in the game, it was found on a GM quest mob and given to
Gnomad
> who successfully used it in the recipie to make the spyglass.
